title: Education on integrated instructional model-based mathematics e-learning system utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic skills and basic proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining an online platform and offline workshops applying an Instructional Design (ID) model, with formative assessment and feedback systems to enhance learner engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic algebraic concepts with over 80% accuracy using e-learning modules developed through the ADDIE model-based instructional design process
Learners improve real-world problem-solving skills by over 70% through digital task performance based on Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Learners can design personalized learning pathways using ID model-integrated tools (learning objective mapping, automated assessment item generators, etc.) within the LMS
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
